code:
---
title: Easy Park Plus - Customer Account State Diagram (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
---

stateDiagram-v2
    [IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker] --> Registered : Account created
    Registered --> Active : Email/identity verified
    Active --> Suspended : Policy violation or payment issue
    Active --> Deactivated : User-initiated or admin action
    Suspended --> Active : Issue resolved
    Suspended --> Deactivated : User or admin action
    Deactivated --> [IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    note right of Suspended
        Account access is restricted
    end note
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 接下来是关于 IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream 和 IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker 的逻辑。
不，其实叫 IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream处理 会更准确一点。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream处理'，对吧？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
